pages.text:
Events at Township No matter what day of the week, you can always find something happening here at Township. From Flip My Ship and Dueling Pianos to $2 Tuesday and The Perfect Week, our events are the prefect reason to grab your crew, order a Das Mule and make some memories Weekly Upcoming Signature Weekly Tuesdays See More Photos × $2 Tuesday 7:00pm Every Tuesday join us for $2 Tuesday. $2 wells ($4 doubles), $2 off half liter beer cocktails, $2 Smash Burger Tacos and $2 select shots Wednesdays × Townie Bingo 7:00pm Every Wednesday come in for Townie Bingo with $10 Townie Punch and prizes for winners Thursdays × Dice Price 7:00pm Roll into the weekend with Dice Price every Thursday. Order a well liquor, select draft beer, goat shot, green tea shot, or lemon drop. Bartender rolls the dice and whatever side it lands on is the price of your drink. Fridays × Flip My Ship 4:00pm - 7:00pm Every Friday join us for Flip My Ship. Order any half liter beer cocktail, half liter select draft, well liquor and tell the bartender you want to Flip My Ship. For every drink or shot ordered, the bartender flips a quarter and you call it in the air. If you win, that drink is on us. If you lose, you pay for the drink Saturdays × Buckets and Doubles 12:00pm $15 buckets of High Noon Sun Sips, Michelob Ultra or Mom Water. Then from 6-10pm, $6 double wells.

Signature See More Photos × Julia Cole Saturday, 10/12/24 | 7pm Get ready, Townies. Nashville country artist, television host, and rising star Julia Cole, who also recently made her Grand Ole Opry debut, is coming to the Ship. So mark your calendars for Saturday, October 12, and let’s make Tallahassee the loudest stop of her tour. $5 cover starting at 5pm. Show starts at 8pm. Book Event
The Garden is a unique setting to Tallahassee complete with outdoor fireplace and a retractable awning. Ohh, and let’s not forget the 32 taps and private bar.
Submit an Event Request
Host It Here at Township
Whatever the event, we've got you covered. Here are just a few of the events that we can host.
Engagement parties (including brunch)
Charitable functions and fundraisers
Corporate meetings and social gatherings
Baby showers (including brunch)
High school reunions
Non-profit meetings and social gatherings
Wedding rehearsal dinners (including brunch)
Conference caterings
Office lunch delivery
